GridPolicies.Label: Unit
Currency

GridPolicies.GroupFormat:
const vndItems = this.ChildrenItems
    .map(x => x.Entity)
    .filter(x => x.Currency.Name === 'VND' && x.TotalAmountTax);

const vndAmount = vndItems.length === 0
    ? ''
    : vndItems
        .reduce((a, b) => a.plus(b.TotalAmountTax || 0), new this.Decimal(0))
        .toFixed(0)
        .replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ',') + ' VND';

const usdItems = this.ChildrenItems
    .map(x => x.Entity)
    .filter(x => x.Currency.Code != 'VND' && x.TotalAmountTax);

const usdAmount = usdItems.length === 0
    ? ''
    : usdItems
        .reduce((a, b) => a.plus(b.TotalAmountTax || 0), new this.Decimal(0))
        .toFixed(3)
        .replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ',') + ' USD';

return vndAmount + (usdAmount ? ' ' + usdAmount : '');
